title: Alesha Dixon gives birth to second baby as she films AGT in crop top
text:

Alesha Dixon has given birth to her second baby.

The TV judge was pictured heading to film America's Got Talent in a crop top and holding a denim jacket.

Alesha has yet to release any details about the baby's gender or name.

By contrast, back in May, Alesha confirmed news of her pregnancy during a live episode of Britain's Got Talent.

The 40-year-old singer, who has five-year-old daughter Azura with partner Azuka Ononye, stood up to reveal her bump for the first time during the first semi-final of 2019.

(Image: GoffPhotos.com)

(Image: aleshaofficial/Instagram)

After keeping the news a closely guarded secret, Alesha looked delighted to confirm her blossoming bump during a song and dance routine that kick-started the show.

When asked about the fantastic news by presenters Ant McPartlin and Declan Donnelly, Alesha said: "Over the moon, yes. Lovely place to celebrate it."

Co-judge David Walliams then joked that the baby was his.

(Image: Dymond/Thames/Syco/REX)

(Image: Dymond/Thames/Syco/REX)

"We're very happy. These things happen when you're on the tour," said David.

Amanda Holden said she had a feeling Alesha would give birth early.

"I’m a witch, I sense these things and I said, ‘You’ve got to be careful. I reckon it’s going to come two or three weeks early," she predicted.

(Image: Internet Unknown)

Before revealing she was pregnant, Alesha spoke to You magazine earlier this year about her desire to expand her family.

"Not a day goes by without me longing for another baby," she said.

“I don’t know whether it will happen given my age, but I adore the idea of a large family and I hope I will be lucky."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Getty)



Alesha didn't announce she was pregnant with her first child Azura until after she had given birth.

She said she had thought twice about sharing details of her private life following her heartbreaking split from husband MC Harvey .

Alesha ended her marriage to the So Solid Crew rapper after just one year when she discovered he'd cheated in 2006.

The former Mis-Teeq singer went on to find love with professional model and dancer Azuka. It's believed they marred in secret in 2017 though neither of them has confirmed the news.

(Image: Internet Unknown)

(Image: Twitter)

Alesha will now have her hands full as she juggles being a mum of two with her new day job on America's Got Talent: The Champions.

After taking Mel B's role on the panel, Alesha join Simon Cowell, Heidi Klum and Howie Mandel in judging acts from series from around the world.
description: The Britain's Got Talent judge was spotted heading to film the US version of the hit talent show in a revealing crop top
